attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the government’s handling of the riots in England
attributes.additional_details:
The governments handling of the recent riots that have taken place across London and other major cities in England has been slow and weak. People’s properties, businesses and life’s have been put at risk due to the slow and weak response of both the government and the police.

This petition is to allow the people to show their dissatisfaction with the response of the government, and to show that the general public will not tolerate a government that is unable to keep law and order.
